product_name: The North Face WindWall 1 Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face WindWall(R) 1 men's jacket combines wind resistance and warm, lightweight fleece for a jacket that's equally at home on far-away trekking trips or your favorite local coffee shop. WindWall 1 is made from polyester fleece that delivers wind-resistant warmth in moderate cold and provides excellent insulation when layered. The North Face WindWall 1 features 2 zippered hand pockets, a drawcord hem and elastic cuffs. Standard fit ensures freedom of motion. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face WindWall(R) 1 men's jacket combines wind resistance and warm, lightweight fleece for a jacket that's equally at home on far-away trekking trips or your favorite local coffee shop.
